name: Lose Control (cookiecrayon)
description:
YOUR CONTROLLER'S CONTROLS ARE OUT OF CONTROL. CAN YOU TAKE CONTROL?

Lose Control is the fifth game created by cookiecrayon for the GMTK 2020 Game Jam. The jam went for 48 hours while the theme for the jam was 'Out of Control'.

HOW TO PLAY: Keep all the buttons on screen until the timer runs out. Click and drag the buttons back to into their slots in the controller to temporarily lock them in.
